name: quantconnect-mcp
description: QuantConnect platform integration with AI assistants for algorithmic trading project management, backtesting, and API access through MCP
long_description: An MCP server that provides AI assistants with access to QuantConnect's algorithmic trading platform. Features include project management, file management, backtesting, and authentication tools for quantitative finance.

tools.name: configure_quantconnect_auth
tools.description: Configure QuantConnect API authentication credentials

tools.name: validate_quantconnect_auth
tools.description: Validate QuantConnect API credentials

tools.name: get_auth_status
tools.description: Check current authentication status

tools.name: test_quantconnect_api
tools.description: Test QuantConnect API connectivity

tools.name: clear_quantconnect_auth
tools.description: Clear stored authentication credentials

tools.name: get_auth_header
tools.description: Get authentication header for API requests

tools.name: read_account
tools.description: Read organization account status and information

tools.name: authorize_connection
tools.description: Authorize external connection with live brokerage or data provider

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create new algorithmic trading projects in QuantConnect

tools.name: read_project
tools.description: Get project details or list all projects

tools.name: update_project
tools.description: Update project name and description

tools.name: compile_project
tools.description: Compile a project for backtesting

tools.name: read_compilation_result
tools.description: Read the result of a compilation job

tools.name: delete_project
tools.description: Delete a project from QuantConnect

tools.name: create_project_collaborator
tools.description: Add a collaborator to a project

tools.name: read_project_collaborators
tools.description: List all collaborators on a project

tools.name: update_project_collaborator
tools.description: Update collaborator information in a project

tools.name: delete_project_collaborator
tools.description: Remove a collaborator from a project

tools.name: read_project_nodes
tools.description: Read available and selected nodes of a project

tools.name: update_project_nodes
tools.description: Update the active state of project nodes

tools.name: create_file
tools.description: Create new files in QuantConnect projects

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read file content from QuantConnect projects

tools.name: update_file_content
tools.description: Update file content in QuantConnect projects

tools.name: update_file_name
tools.description: Rename files in QuantConnect projects

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Delete a file from a QuantConnect project

tools.name: create_backtest
tools.description: Create and run backtests for algorithmic trading strategies

tools.name: read_backtest
tools.description: Get backtest results and performance metrics

tools.name: read_backtest_chart
tools.description: Get backtest chart data

tools.name: read_backtest_orders
tools.description: Get backtest order history

tools.name: read_backtest_insights
tools.description: Get backtest insights and signals

tools.name: delete_backtest
tools.description: Delete a backtest from a project

tools.name: list_backtests
tools.description: List all backtests for a project

tools.name: update_backtest
tools.description: Update a backtest's name or note

tools.name: create_live_algorithm
tools.description: Create a live algorithm deployment

tools.name: read_live_algorithm
tools.description: Read comprehensive live algorithm statistics and data

tools.name: liquidate_live_algorithm
tools.description: Liquidate all positions in a live algorithm

tools.name: stop_live_algorithm
tools.description: Stop a live algorithm

tools.name: list_live_algorithms
tools.description: List live algorithms with optional filters

tools.name: read_live_logs
tools.description: Read logs from a live algorithm

tools.name: read_live_chart
tools.description: Read chart data from a live algorithm

tools.name: read_live_portfolio
tools.description: Read portfolio state from a live algorithm

tools.name: read_live_orders
tools.description: Read orders from a live algorithm

tools.name: read_live_insights
tools.description: Read insights from a live algorithm

tools.name: estimate_optimization_time
tools.description: Estimate execution time of optimization with specified parameters

tools.name: create_optimization
tools.description: Create an optimization with specified parameters

tools.name: read_optimization
tools.description: Read an optimization by its ID

tools.name: list_optimizations
tools.description: List all optimizations for a project

tools.name: update_optimization
tools.description: Update the name of an optimization

tools.name: abort_optimization
tools.description: Abort an optimization that is currently running

tools.name: delete_optimization
tools.description: Delete an optimization

QUANTCONNECT_USER_ID.title: QuantConnect User ID
QUANTCONNECT_USER_ID.description: Your QuantConnect account user ID (numeric identifier)

QUANTCONNECT_API_TOKEN.title: QuantConnect API Token
QUANTCONNECT_API_TOKEN.description: Your QuantConnect API token for authentication

QUANTCONNECT_ORGANIZATION_ID.title: QuantConnect Organization ID
QUANTCONNECT_ORGANIZATION_ID.description: Organization ID for team accounts (optional for individual accounts)

MCP_TRANSPORT.title: MCP Transport Method
MCP_TRANSPORT.description: Transport method for MCP communication (stdio, sse, or websocket)

MCP_HOST.title: MCP Host
MCP_HOST.description: Host address for MCP server (only required for sse/websocket transport)

MCP_PORT.title: MCP Port
MCP_PORT.description: Port number for MCP server (only required for sse/websocket transport)
